name: Abdul-Azeez Olugbenga Ibrahim
bio: My name is Abdul-Azeez Olugbenga Ibrahim and I am the Speaker Of The House for NUMSA 23/24 administration. I'm from Lagos State but lived most of my life in Abuja. I love to organize and spend my free time solving riddles and playing Chess. My life motto is 'Make a positive impact in the lives of everyone you encounter and my mission in NUMSA is to create a community where every member matters and every member has an opportunity to achieve their goals.
